'I'm home!'%K%P
Pulling aside the door curtain, I arrived back at our\nkimono shop, 'Tatsumi's'.%K%P
Being one of the Tatsumis on the sign, I live here,\nin a living space at the back of the shop.%K%P
'There's no one manning the shop, AGAIN.\nThey're asking for trouble...'%K%P
Mother and father weren't that old, but maybe\ninheriting this ancient kimono shop gave them\nold fashioned ideas.%K%P
Despite all the valuable kimono stored here,\nthey often left without locking the door.%K%P
Luckily, here in Kanda there were a lot of old\nwholesalers and small shops, and everyone looks out\nfor each other, so we've not had any trouble so far.%K%P
'Hmm... Someone's here?'%K%P
Someone was in the back of the shop.%K%P
My mother? Or perhaps...%K%P
I beheld a heavenly being. %K%P
She was probably trying things on,\nas she was wrapped in a light under-robe.%K%P
It was Sara.%K%P
That was no heavenly being,\nthat was my friend, the goddess.%K%P
Sara Benzaiten was the center for L☆SEVEN, making\nher one of the most popular Divine Idols there were.%K%P
And right now she was changing\nclothes in front of me.%K%P
I knew I shouldn't be looking,\nbut I couldn't seem to avert my eyes.%K%P
'Mmm... Mmmhmmm...♪'%K%P
She was humming happily.%K%P
Even without using any Jinriki, that voice could\nenthrall people, and the clear tone of it was full\nof healing power.%K%P
I had been moved by Shuri's passionate singing,\nbut Sara's healing voice held another kind of\nenchantment.%K%P
Under other circumstances, I'd probably\nhave been thinking about their differences...%K%P
But right now, the sight before my eyes\nblew all such thoughts out of my mind.%K%P
I held my breath, watching Sara.%K%P
The sun shone through her dress, making it\ntransparent and showing the outline of her body.%K%P
Her womanly curves gave rise to all kinds of ideas.%K%P
It grew hard to breathe,\nand my heart pounded loud in my ears.%K%P
I couldn't leave, nor could I move closer,\nI was frozen in place.%K%P
Sara's humming stopped.%K%P
The breeze from the window gently\nfluttered her light robe.%K%P
I couldn't see her skin, but then\nSara's attention fell from her song.%K%P
In that instant, the spell fell from me, as well.%K%P
'Yamato...?'%K%P
Her gaze turned toward the shop entrance...\nToward me.%K%P
'S-Sara...'%K%P
'Heehee, welcome back.'%K%P
Saying nothing of my peeping,\nshe just welcomed me with a soft smile.%K%P
